Skills

About

Hi, I'm Lily. I'm a multifaceted Computer Science professional, fluent in several programming languages including Java, Python, JavaScript, R, R Markdown, HTML5/CSS, Unix, and MATLAB. My proficiency in database query languages extends to Snowflake, MySQL, Oracle SQL, and AWS. I am skilled at working with frameworks like React, Django, Angular, Spring Boot, and Git. My expertise in Machine Learning spans Regression models (Linear, Logistic, Lasso, Ridge), Random Forest, and Neural Network applications. I also hold an AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate certification.

Throughout my academic and professional journey, I've actively engaged in various research projects. A key project was on 'Bayesian Compositional Data Analysis with Informative Priors' where I integrated Bayesian (SSL) regression for parameter estimation and variable selection. Additionally, I've worked on several projects involving Machine Learning and data analysis, like 'Paper Abstract Partitioning for PUBMED RCT Dataset Based on Machine Learning' and 'Prediction of the stock market on LSTM modeling'.

Experience

  • 2023 - Present
    Data Analyst Intern

    Assisted with data cleaning and preparation using R and SQL. And building websites using Shiny.io. Aided in the development of Shiny Apps for internal use. Documented the project using R Markdown, ensuring comprehensive understanding of the process and outcomes.

    May 2022 - June 2022
    The Ultimate 2022 Full-stack Web Development Bootcamp

    Built fully-fledged personal profile websites and web apps using JavaScript ES6+, Bootstrap 5, Django, and Postgres framework. Conducted unit and load testing for high-profile customer-facing applications, and reduced system failure rate by 70%.

    October 2021 - December 2021
    Ultimate AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate 2021

    Performed Real-World Solutions on AWS using the Serverless Fundamentals (Lambda, DynamoDB, Cognito, API Gateway). Analyzed 10+ Solution Architectures (traditional & serverless) and mastered all Database types on AWS. Decoupled applications: SQS, SNS, Kinesis, Active MQ, and secured AWS Cloud using KMS, and IAM Policies & SSM.

    February 2020 - May 2020
    Luddy School of Informatics, Computing, and Engineering

    Adopted pipelines written in SKLearn for data preparation, machine learning, hyperparameter tuning, and statistical significance testing. Management, access and use of Big Data. Solved problems in an end-to-end fashion for multi-class classification, regression, unsupervised learning using SVMs, Decision Trees, kMeans, k nearest neighbors, naïve Bayes, regression, PCA.
